original_text: You shall bring from your dwelling places two loaves of bread to be waved, made of two tenths of an ephah. They shall be of fine flour, and they shall be baked with leaven, as firstfruits to the Lord.
korean_text: 너희의 처소에서 십분의 이 에바로 만든 떡 두 개를 가져다가 흔들지니 이는 고운 가루에 누룩을 넣어서 구운 것이요 이는 첫 요제로 여호와께 드리는 것이며

sentences.original_text: You shall bring from your dwelling places
two loaves of bread to be waved
made of two tenths of an ephah
They shall be of fine flour
and they shall be baked with leaven
